name: Lumines GB
description:
I've always love the original Game Boy DMG ever since I first played one, I was hooked.  It has been my favorite portable and was always a pipe dream to write games for it.  One of my favorite puzzle games of all time is Lumines on the PSP and Vita and when I found out that games could be made for the Game Boy, I had to try.

This is a port of Lumines for the Game Boy.  

  • Control the blocks with the D-Pad
  • B button rotates blocks counter clockwise, A button rotates blocks clockwise
  • The game will adjust speed over play time for extra challenges
  • High score save feature included
